about_the_game:
Lionheart, the legendary pirate captain, has returned to make them pay for the betrayal he suffered 20 years ago during the Great Pirate Revolution against the ruthless monopoly bosses who have the galaxy and the Federation in their claws.

Realising that the Federation has become a pawn in the hands of the monopoly bosses, will the honourable intelligence officers and experienced pirate captains scattered across the galaxy support Lionheart in this great battle?

Are you ready to send your precious pilots into battle against artificially intelligent enemies unleashed across the galaxy by an evil force?

Will you be able to find experienced and fearless pilots, Captain, to fight this powerful enemy with speeds and manoeuvrability far beyond human physical limits?

Will you be able to control these brave fighter pilots who have been cooked in the toughest of conflicts and become bastards of war? Will you be able to call disobedient pilots back to the hangar in the middle of a fierce firefight when they change their targets against orders?

As an experienced captain on a covert mission, you know that every asteroid, projectile and enemy ship poses a significant risk. You have learned through the most painful experiences that space is no joke, Captain, and now you must use all your skills against a powerful enemy that is preparing to enslave humanity for thousands of years.

Being captain of this ship is a great responsibility. Can you handle it, Captain Lionheart?

  • Destroy enemy ships, loot their technology and equipment, then use it to upgrade your own ships and fighters.

  • Command your carier and send your fighter pilots on missions,

  • Find and train new officers and pilots, on procedural game universe map.

  • Buy, sell or craft new weapons, equipment and technologies, build relationships with factions on planets, repair your ships on their planets and take on new missions, strengthen your relationships and learn new secrets.

Infinite number of items: Weapons, missiles, accessories

You set your own missions:

  • Rush to the aid of attacked ships,

  • Rescue pilots and crews thrown into space from damaged ships.

  • Investigate anomalies that have caught the attention of scientists.

  • Send your fighters to hunt down enemy ships.

  • Go after enemy factions.

  • Set out to find out what happened in the colonies where communication was lost.

  • Scan the area and uncover lurking enemies.

  • 2D design that provides full control over the battle map

  • Advanced AI-controlled pilots and enemies that can make their own decisions

  • Procedural maps – Every game is a new adventure

  • Many loot and a detailed inventory management

  • Different approaches of pilots and officers with different characters to every situation

  • Destructible environmental factors, asteroids, shipwrecks, old stations, space junk

  • Advanced sound effects and impressive soundtracks

[/list]

What is Smart-Pause Game (SPG)

In order to combine the tactical richness of turn-based strategy games with the action richness of real-time strategy games, we developed a pause system in Pirate Patrol that we call Smart Pause Game (SPG).

To define it, we can use the Real Time with Pause (RTwP) system that we see in real time games. However, Smart Pause is more advanced than RTwP and aims to increase the player's sense of control in a "real-time" game. With SPG, the game is automatically "paused" according to the player's reactions and what they want to do, allowing the player to easily make tactical decisions. This allows the player to plan and give orders while the action is still going on, without having to constantly press the pause button or without uncomfortable pauses caused by predetermined and repetitive events.
